entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
